name: Shovel Jump
description:
My variation of the project for Epic MegaJam 2022 on which I worked as an animator
https://itch.io/jam/2022-epic-megajam/rate/1688192

I modified the project so you can just jump to the top with a shovel

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Shift - Run

Shift + Space = Epic jump

LMB - Punch

G - ON/OFF Epic Jump Mode
